trans-unit.source: Command line tool for interacting with Mbed OS projects
trans-unit.target: 用于与Mbed操作系统项目交互的命令行工具。

trans-unit.source: Mbed CLI is a Python script, so you’ll need Python installed in order to use it. mbed CLI was tested with Python 2.7 and Python 3.6.
trans-unit.target: Mbed CLI是Python脚本，因此您需要安装Python才能使用它。mbed CLI已通过Python 2.7和Python 3.6进行了测试。

trans-unit.source: Mbed CLI is licensed under Apache-2.0

Mbed CLI is the name of the Arm Mbed command line tool, packaged as mbed-cli, which enables the full mbed workflow: repositories version control, maintaining dependencies, publishing code, updating from remotely hosted repositories (GitHub, GitLab and mbed.com), and invoking Arm Mbed’s own build system and export functions, among other operations.
trans-unit.target: Mbed CLI是Arm Mbed命令行工具的名称，打包为mbed-cli，可启用完整的mbed工作流程：存储库版本控制，维护依赖项，发布代码，从远程托管存储库（GitHub，GitLab和mbed.com）进行更新，并调用Arm Mbed自己的构建系统和导出功能以及其他操作。

trans-unit.source: Mbed CLI supports both Git and Mercurial repositories, so you’ll also need to install Mercurial and Git.
trans-unit.target: Mbed CLI支持Git和Mercurial存储库，因此您还需要安装Mercurial和Git。

trans-unit.source: The best way to get started is to read the documentation on GitHub.
trans-unit.target: 最好的入门方法是阅读GitHub上的文档。
